title: Calories in Garlic Powder
meta_description: Discover calories in garlic powder per teaspoon, including carbs, protein, sodium, and full nutrition breakdown for easy meal planning.
assumptions: Standard garlic powder, finely ground; 1 tsp ≈ 3 g; no added salt or fillers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, processing, and additives like anti-caking agents. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One teaspoon of garlic powder has about 10 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use 1 tbsp (3 tsp) instead of 1 tsp
Garlic powder with added salt per tsp

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tsp garlic powder?

faqs.a: Yes, around 2.3 g carbs per tsp, with 0.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is garlic powder low in sodium?
faqs.a: Very low—only 1 mg per tsp in plain varieties.

faqs.q: Calories in garlic powder per 100 g?
Can garlic powder replace fresh garlic?
faqs.a: Yes, but 1 tsp powder equals about 1 clove; calories are lower in powder due to dehydration.
